translator writing systemsa critical review of recent efforts to automatethe writing of translators of programming languages is presented the formal study of syntax and its applicationto translator writing are discussed in section ii various approaches to automating the post syntactic(semantic aspects of translator writing are discussed in section iii and several related topics in section iv.cacm february 1968feldman j.gries d.compiler compiler-compiler translator translatorwriting systems metacompiler syntax semantics syntax-directed meta-assembler macroprocessor,parser syntactic
